Description: A cluster peer establishes a trusted network relationship between two FSx for ONTAP file systems, allowing them to securely communicate and replicate encrypted, authenticated data. It is used for disaster recovery across clusters in different regions, providing flexibility for data protection and high availability. Once activated, you need a preview key to consume this resource. Please reach out to Ng-fsx-cloudformation@netapp.com to get the key. To use this resource, you must first create the Link module.
